Text:
Muhammad was an evil warlord/FALSE PROPHET. He came up with Islam to have a army that thought it was fucking virgins when they died. Who WOULDN'T want to die and have that back in that time period of ignorance. 

So aye...Muhammad was an evil lying bastard that twisted Christianity to his own gains.
We who grew up with REAL history that was unbiased know the reality of such things.
Common sense and logic helps as well.

Israel wouldn't have to torture terrorist shitbags if Islam didn't exist. It is the single most evil and "world trouble causing" religion in history(don't bring up that Crusades crap that's ANCIENT history). Yes and don't bring up that Crusader crap from the middle ages. That's a thousand years ago. Christians DO NOT TEACH their followers to be terrorists. Period. Nor do the other major religions. Islam is the sole religion which has caused ALL the trouble in the middle east expanding out from there to cause the rest of the world problems. They are so ALLAH DAMNED(Allah name of the persian MOON God...look it up in history if you can find REAL history anymore).

The peaceful actors of this evil religion(Islam) must either rip out the sections of hatred and death in their "Islamic Bibles" or just ignore it and claim to be a peaceful branch. Perhaps some are peaceful in fact, but they have to lie to their Islamic religion to be peaceful. Just as the branches of Christianity broke off and created their own quasi churches(except Christians didn't train terrorists in the different "branches"). Writing their own bibles their own way. 

The circumstances of the creation of Islam CANNOT be denied however. It is not faith or a prophet, but just a man which brought it about into this world. An evil tyrant of a man who rather descended into Hell than ascended to heaven in the cave of the rock. Muhammad is in Hell. If ever there was a Hell he IS there. He may have been a demon disguised as a man. He certainly was a FALSE prophet. One that Jesus of Nazarath warned of. 

Islam. That is the problem with the Middle East. The only problem. THE problem. Without it there would not be this ignorant terrorist TRASH running about killing innocent men, women, and children in their region as well as throughout the world.

Don't blame the jews. They had that land thousands of years ago. Arabs are just stubborn and stupidly active. They LOVE to protest and by ALL appearances take part in violent acts hiding their evil behind Islam. It's built into their EVIL religion.

So...fuck you if you disagree. It's the GOD's honest truth...put harshly and embelished ever so slightly(the pig thing) albeit, but the truth non-the-less.
No matter what you whine out The Truth will NOT change. 
I have spoken it. Renounce Islam. Become HUMAN again. What kind of religion makes their own children run in fear from their parents fear of being KILLED for leaving their demonic shitholing F'ed up Islamic religion. NO others. Just islam. 

If I had a time machine I would go back and slit Muhammad's throat before he had the time to fuck up the world for centuries. I'd do it with pleasure.

Have a nice day. If you disagree know you are wrong...and you know it somewhere deep inside you even if you won't admit it. Open your mind to real knowledge; real history and things become clear to the logical mind.
